titleStmt.title: An Epistle to all the Christian magistrates and powers in the whole Christendom and professors, and teachers, and Christians that witness the end of the law, and the Levitical priesthood, and confess Christ Jesus ...
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.
Gould, Anne, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 12 by Anne Gould and four others and at end: G.F.
Written in part by George Fox. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
